          a. Forward: traverse from left to right (starting at index 1).

children.text:
If the current char is same as the previous, then flip the current (in a simulated string, but we don't actually need the entire string, only the count) and count++.
          b. Backward: traverse from right to left (starting at the last but one). If the current char is same as the next, then flip the current and count++. Then take min(a1, a2). Let result2 = min(a1, a2). Step 5: Convert result2 to a string (call it s2). This is the input for the third program.
